Comments_List: I gained a ton of insight into where contemporary critical theory now stands as a mode of political theorizing.

I think the course could be improved by spending a bit more time with the background of Habermas's work. So, reading a bit into Kant and Hegel might do a lot of good for everyone, just so we all have the same language.
